mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", p.name AS "broker.name", a.type AS "type", a.amount_request AS "amountRequest", a.amount_payment AS "amountPayment", a.channel AS "channel", a.voucher AS "voucher", a.account AS "account", a.status AS "status", a.memo AS "memo", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker p ON p.id = a.broker_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_payment( id, broker_id, type, amount_request, amount_payment, channel, voucher, account, status, memo, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{broker.id}, #{type}, #{amountRequest}, #{amountPayment}, #{channel}, #{voucher}, #{account}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_payment SET broker_id = #{broker.id}, type = #{type}, amount_request = #{amountRequest}, amount_payment = #{amountPayment}, channel = #{channel}, voucher = #{voucher}, account = #{account}, status = #{status}, memo = #{memo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
